SEARCH
Package ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380

Class Train

java.lang.Object
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.Train
public class Train extends Object
The Train class represents a train with an ID, direction, and station. It provides methods to access and modify these properties.

  • Constructor Details

    • Train

      public Train(int id, String direction)
      Constructs a Train object with the specified ID and direction.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the train
      direction - the direction of the train ("forward" or "backward")

    • Train

      public Train(int id, String name, Station station)
      Constructs a Train object with the specified ID, name, and station.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the train
      name - the name of the train
      station - the station where the train is located
